text: It's been more than five years since Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemworth first met on the set of The Last Song. The epic romance that ensued was filled with quite a few breakups, many glimmers of hope, and scores of cute moments in between. In 2016, though, everything's different. After officially resuming their engagement in January, the couple has made their first public outing together : a sweet weekend lunch date in LA. To get you all caught up on what led us to this point, look back on all the ups and downs of Miley and Liam's epic saga.
